segments.text: I'll be with you in a second . Uh ... Yes , ma'am ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: This is not what I asked for . I'm afraid .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , I'm so sorry . May I ask what you ordered again ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes . What I ordered is roast beef , not roast beef sandwiches .
segments.speaker: S1
